summary.suggested_edit: In the section on Canon Medical Systems and CT developments, append after the mention of the Aquilion series innovations: 'In December 2025, Canon unveiled next-generation CT technology for advanced medical imaging, enhancing diagnostic capabilities (RT @sciencegirl on X, id 1997735519091036245).'
summary.original_text: Canon Medical Systems develops and manufactures systems for computed tomography (CT) , including the Aquilion series, which introduced innovations such as the world's first multislice helical CT in 1998, a 320-row area detector CT in 2007, and the high-definition Aquilion Precision in 2017, enabling ultra-high-resolution imaging with reduced radiation doses.

summary.suggested_edit: In the section discussing 4680 Bharat battery cells and vehicle deliveries, update or append to the Roadster X or S1 Pro+ mentions: 'Ola Electric began mass deliveries of vehicles powered by its 4680 Bharat Cell in December 2025, marking a milestone as the first company to do so at scale (RT @thebigbulldeals on X, id 1997735429987242280).'
summary.original_text: Ola Electric has integrated its proprietary 4680 cylindrical Bharat cells into the Roadster X series, starting from August 2025, to achieve higher energy density and improved efficiency compared to earlier prismatic cells.

summary.suggested_edit: In the 2025 network upgrades section, append after mentions of nationwide upgrades: 'By December 2025, Globacom announced the successful completion of a massive nationwide network infrastructure upgrade, powered by significant new spectrum acquisitions (X post id 1997735145902690698).'
summary.original_text: In 2025, Glo has intensified its infrastructure enhancements by deploying new base stations aimed at elevating voice and data service quality, with a particular emphasis on densifying coverage in high-traffic urban hubs such as Lagos and Abuja. These upgrades include the addition of thousands of 4G LTE sites nationwide, alongside fiber relocations to mitigate vandalism and improve overall network reliability.

summary.suggested_edit: In the section on Canon Medical Systems and CT developments, append after the mention of the Aquilion series innovations: 'In December 2025, Canon unveiled next-generation CT technology for advanced medical imaging, enhancing diagnostic capabilities (RT @sciencegirl on X, id 1997735440468840580).'
summary.original_text: Canon Medical Systems develops and manufactures systems for computed tomography (CT) , including the Aquilion series, which introduced innovations such as the world's first multislice helical CT in 1998, a 320-row area detector CT in 2007, and the high-definition Aquilion Precision in 2017, enabling ultra-high-resolution imaging with reduced radiation doses.
